creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: coiled basket; small foot with outward-flaring sides and wide, rather flat shoulder; short neck with wide mouth opening; red yarn fringe at point of shoulder; light brown with dark brown band of figures on shoulder and body; band of stepped diamonds on neck; repeating circular motifs above and below figures on body
title: Basket
